private  java.lang.ref.Reference ref
          A week reference to this document, used by BufferManager to keep track of our pages, so that it can free them up when the document is garbage collected.

Field Detail

ref

private java.lang.ref.Reference ref
A week reference to this document, used by BufferManager to keep track of our pages, so that it can free them up when the document is garbage collected.
